name: Manifold
text: The Universe Speaks - Response: After you change to this form, flip the Battlefield support to Its TRAVELED side. Forced Response: At the end of the round, flip each TRAVELED support to its UNTRAVELED side.

name: Eden Fesi
text: Traveler - Response: After you change to this form, flip a non-Battlefield UNTRAVELED support to its TRAVELED support to its UNTRAVELED side. Forced Response: At the end of the round, flip each TRAVELED support to its UNTRAVELED side.

name: Battlefield
flavor: “This is what we have to do. You don't have to convince me.” - Manifold

name: Battlefield
text: Permanent. When Revealed: Choose ATK, THW, or DEF. Manifold gets +1 to the chosen power until the end of the round. (Max twice per round) Forced Response: When you flip to your alter-ego form, flip this card.

name: Kata Tjuta
flavor: “This is where I was born. We're on country.” - Manifold

name: Kata Tjuta
text: Permanent. Eden Fesi gets +1 REC. When Revealed: Heal 2 damage from Eden Fesi.
flavor: “This is where I was born. We're on country.” - Manifold

name: Krakoa
flavor: “They made up these three laws. Know what the third one is? 'Respect this sacred land.' They're okay.” - Manifold

name: Krakoa
text: Permanent. Manifold gains retaliate 1. When Revealed: Ready Eden Fesi.
flavor: “They made up these three laws. Know what the third one is? 'Respect this sacred land.' They're okay.” - Manifold

name: The Peak VII
flavor: “S.W.O.R.D. has to speak for Sol.” - Abigail Brand

name: The Peak VII
text: Permanent. Manifold gets +1 hand size. When Revealed: You may shuffle 1 card from your discard pile into your deck.
flavor: “S.W.O.R.D. has to speak for Sol.” - Abigail Brand

name: Clandestine Intel
text: Hero Action (thwart): Confuse the villain and remove threat from a scheme equal to 1 more than the number of TRAVELED supports you control.

name: Folding Space
flavor: “If he tells the univers to fold itself until he can walk across it in a single step-it does. If he tells space to warp so light passes around him-to form a little bubble of invisibility just for him-it will. He says it's not 'tellin.' It's’asking.' It still terrifies me if I think about it for too long.” - Abigail Brand

name: Quick Portal
text: Hero Interrupt (defense): When you would take any amount of damage from an attack, prevent all of that damage. Then, flip to your alter-ego form.
flavor: “Eden Fesi is not a teleporter. That's not what he does at all. Eden Fesi talks to space.” - Abigail Brand

name: Sunfire Portal
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal damage to an enemy equal to 6 more than the number of TRAVELED supports you control. This attack gains ranged and overkill.
flavor: I talk to the universe. And we get along, so she does me little favors. Like catch a piece of sun, and move it from there to here.” - Manifold

name: Positional Awareness
text: Response: After you spend this card, shuffle a card from your discard pile into your deck. You may flip a TRAVELED support to its UNTRAVELED side.

name: Gateway
text: You get +2 hit points. Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Gateway -> flip to your hero form.
flavor: “He's your elder. You remeber what he said. You wanna go somewhere, you gotta know where you started from” - Baz

name: Bending Light
text: Max 1 [per_player]. Manifold gets +2 THW and cannot attack. Forced Interrupt: When an enemy would initate an attack against you, it schemes instead. Forced Interrupt: When the round ends, discard Bending Light

name: Manifold's Staff
text: Manifold gets +1 ATK. Hero Action: Exhaust Manifold's Staff -> ready Manifold.
flavor: “What? Where am I going? Ah, you know. Where I always go. Everywhere” - Manifold
